verses.roman:
sakala bhariyā āche prema-phula-phale
bhāsāila tri-jagat kṛṣṇa-prema-jale

synonyms: sakala—all; bhariyā—filled; āche—there is; prema—love of Godhead; phula—flowers; phale—fruits; bhāsāila—inundated; tri-jagat—the whole world; kṛṣṇa-prema—of love of Kṛṣṇa; jale—with water.
translation: Every branch and subbranch of the tree is full of innumerable fruits and flowers. They inundate the world with the waters of love of Kṛṣṇa.
